description: Alterations and enlargement of existing single storey rear extension; alteration to front, side and rear elevation fenestrations including insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door, and replacement of existing windows with double glazed aluminium windows; construction of a single storey detached rear garden outbuilding; and installation of folding gates to front boundary wall
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: Location Plan, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-003 - P2 EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-006 -P2 EXISTING ROOF PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-007 - P2 EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-008 - P2 EXISTING REAR ELEVATION, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-103 - P2 PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-110 - P1 PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION AND FRONT GATE/ BOUNDARY TREATMENT, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-005 - P2 EXISTING SECOND FLOOR PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-004 - P2 EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-109 - P3 PROPOSED OUTBUILDING, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-105 - P2 PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR PLAN , PC-W53HD-148-DWG-104 - P2 PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN , PC-W53HD-148-DWG-001 - P2 EXISTING SITE PLAN GROUND FLOOR PLAN, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-106 - P2 PROPOSED ROOF PLAN , PC-W53HD-148-DWG-107 - P2 PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION, PC-W53HD-148-DWG-108 - P2 PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION, W53HD PC-W53HD-148-DWG-002 - P2 EXISTING & PROPOSED GF PLANS
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
